description: Impress guests at your next outdoor gathering with crusty rolls loaded with BBQ hickory smoke-infused sausages, bacon, cheese and slaw.
name: Smokey Bbq Sausage Submarine Sandwich Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g Woolworths BBQ Hickory Smoke Infused Beef Sausages
1 cup Woolworths Smokey Chipotle Cheddar & Tasty Cheese Shredded Blend
0.25 bunch spring onions, green part sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil on a barbecue plate on medium-high heat. Add bacon and cook, stirring, for 5 minutes or until crispy. Transfer to a bowl and cover to keep warm.

Reduce heat to medium. Add sausages to barbecue. Cook, turning occasionally, for 10 minutes or almost cooked through. Continue to cook, brushing sausages with barbecue sauce for a further 2 minutes or until sticky and cooked through.
Meanwhile, prepare coleslaw in a large bowl according to packet instructions.

Using a small sharp knife, make a cut into the top of each roll without cutting the whole way through. Place some of the slaw in each roll, then top with a sausage and some bacon, cheese and spring onions. Serve with remaining slaw.
